name: OpenVocoder
short_description: OpenVocoder is exactly what its name suggests: An open-source vocoder. OpenVocoder, or "OpVoc", is capable of encoding many different audio file formats, and applying a wide range of flexible filters to them, then exporting to one of many formats.
